data.title: Background of The Apple Inc
data.meta_description: Background of the Apple Inc - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Apple started in 1976 as a computer company but has since expanded into other industries. In 2001, Apple broke into the music player market with the iPod and in 2007 entered the phone market with the highly successful iPhone. Apple produces Mac computers, iPads, the iPhone, iPod, Mac OS operating system, and software like iLife and iWork. Its world headquarters are located in Cupertino, California due to the concentration of engineers in the area and to be near its origins without seeking outside investment.
